item.title: Docker安装mysql
item.author: meowrain
item.description: Docker安装mysql 1 2 3 4 $ docker pull mysql:latest $ cd ~ $ mkdir mysql $ cd mysql 1 $ docker run -p 3306:3306 --name mysql -v $PWD/conf/my.cnf:/etc/mysql/my.cnf -v $PWD/logs:/logs -v $PWD/data:/mysql_data -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -d mysql 连接mysql https://docs.fedoraproject.org/en-US/quick-docs/installing-mysql-mariadb/ 可以参考一下官方文档 1 $ sudo dnf install community-mysql-server 1 $ mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -P 3306 -u root -p123456
